itunes:title: Episode 1025 - MeatEater Steve Rinella
title: Episode 1025 - MeatEater Steve Rinella
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: The host of Netflix's MeatEater, Steve Rinella, joins the show to talk about his new book "Outdoor Kids in an Inside World: Getting Your Family Out of the House and Radically Engaged with Nature", how he's raising his children to be "outdoor kids", growi...
itunes:summary:
The host of Netflix's MeatEater, Steve Rinella, joins the show to talk about his new book "Outdoor Kids in an Inside World: Getting Your Family Out of the House and Radically Engaged with Nature", how he's raising his children to be "outdoor kids", growing up as an outdoor kid himself, hunting squirrels and birds in New York City (which he has done, often), why he encourages his daughter to hunt.
